question: Who was the hero of "Pagri Sambhal Jatta Movement"?
explanation: Sardar Ajit Singh was the hero of "Pagri Sambhal Jatta Movement". He was a revolutionary during the time of British rule in India. In 1907, farmers felt threatened by the Colonisation Act that this Act would reduce owners to ordinary workers on their own lands. The farmers who are currently protesting at Delhi gates are also inspired by this movement.
